description:
Hiring for HR Assistant, or Junior Human Resources Associate, provides administrative support to other HR professionals:

Responsibilties

  • Recruitment: Assisting with scheduling and interviewing job applicants, identifying top candidates, and conducting reference checks
  • Onboarding: Preparing employment offers, contracts, and onboarding documents, and planning and implementing new employee meetings and orientation. Must have experience with doing I9 documentation.
  • Record keeping: Maintaining HR records, such as applications, résumés, and applicant logs
  • Payroll: Processing payroll updates and managing the payroll process, including claim resolutions and payment invoice approvals. ADP experience but not necessary
  • Benefits: Answering benefits inquiries, ensuring completion of benefits enrollment, and communicating with benefit admins and vendors
  • Other: Documenting staff changes, performance reports, and communications, checking employee attendance, and monitoring leaves, tardiness, and absence
